definition: surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: Bigger correlation coefficients can be obtained by the broad heritability method.
sentences.chinese: 按廣義遺傳力法選用研究性狀則相關係數大。

sentences.english: This problem can be solved by using GFT technique.
sentences.chinese: 採用廣義離散付氏變換可以解決這個問題。

sentences.english: In a wide sense of the word, criminology includes penology.
sentences.chinese: 從廣義上講，犯罪學包括刑罰學。

sentences.english: Wang Fuzhi s Shuo Wen Guang Yi focuses on changes of morphology and semantic meaning.
sentences.chinese: 王夫之《說文廣義》着眼詞的形義變化。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is very significant to study the generalized semi-infinite programming.
sentences.chinese: 因此研究廣義半無限規劃問題具有重要的實際意義。

sentences.english: In chapter 5 the analytical theory and method in generalized energy saving are put forward.
sentences.chinese: 第五章提出了廣義節能分析的理論和方法。

sentences.english: The generalized active forces of the beam are applied forces of the moving support and elastic forces of the beam.
sentences.chinese: 梁的廣義主動力取爲動支承的作用力和彈性力。

sentences.english: The generalized Riesz summability operators of Laplace series are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 引進了拉普拉斯級數的廣義黎斯可和算子。

sentences.english: In this paper, the state estimation problem for the singular discrete stochastic linear systems is dia-cussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了廣義離散隨機線性系統的狀態估計問題。

sentences.english: The paper analyzed and predicted the hospital expense with generalized linear model.
sentences.chinese: 用廣義線性迴歸模型分別對住院費用進行分析和預測。

sentences.english: In physical prospecting, we need to calculate the integrals of 1th Bessel function.
sentences.chinese: 物理勘探中，需要計算含一階貝塞爾函數的廣義積分。

sentences.english: A generalized morpho interpolation method for nonrigid body motion is proposed based on morpho translation.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種基於形態變換的非剛體運動的廣義內插方法。

sentences.english: The choice of the implementer as well as broad IT platform becomes more and more important.
sentences.chinese: 對實施者和廣義IT平臺的選擇變得越來越重要。

sentences.english: This paper presents a method of compensator design of generalized systems.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹一種廣義系統補償器的設計方法。

sentences.english: By using the concept of generalized simply supported edge together with the method of superposition, we can solve this problem.
sentences.chinese: 用廣義簡支邊這個概念及疊加法，就可以解這類問題。

sentences.english: According to general relativity, time is stitched together with space to form four-dimensional space - time.
sentences.chinese: 根據廣義相對論，時間與空間一起形成了四維時空。

definition: (conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
to discuss two disparate things together (idiom); to mention on equal terms/to place on a par with/(often with negatives: impossible to mention X in the same breath as Y)
abbr. for 黃帝內經|黄帝内经[Huang2 di4 Nei4 jing1], The Yellow Emperor's Internal Canon, medical text c. 300 BC
to differentiate/to draw a distinction/to divide into categories
to part or leave each other/to distinguish/difference/in different ways/differently/separately or individually
to correspond/answering (one another)/to agree (among the part)/corresponding/relevant/appropriate/(modify) accordingly
